message_1: In a beauty contest game with 10 players, each player needs to choose a number between 0 and 100. The winner will be the player whose number is the closest to two-thirds of the average of all chosen numbers. What number should a player choose to maximize their chances of winning?
message_2:

Let's first assume that all players choose a number between 0 and 100 randomly. The average of these numbers would be around 50. So, two-thirds of this average would be (2/3) * 50 = 33.33.
